mapper.select: select a.id, a.user_id, a.article_type, a.version_count, ad.title, ad.short_title, ad.picture, ad.summary, ad.source, ad.source_url, a.official, a.topping, a.cream, ad.status, a.deleted, a.create_time, a.update_time, ad.content, ad.category_id, c.category_name, t.id as tag_id, t.tag_name, t.tag_type from article a left join article_detail ad on a.id = ad.article_id and ad.latest = 1 and ad.deleted = 0 left join category c on ad.category_id = c.id and c.deleted = 0 left join article_tag at on a.id = at.article_id and at.deleted = 0 left join tag t on at.tag_id = t.id and t.deleted = 0 where a.id = #{articleId}
